articles.author: Erin Doherty
articles.title: EU will delay planned U.S. tariffs for six months to allow for trade talks - CNBC
articles.description: President Donald Trump last month announced a trade deal with the EU that included 15% tariffs on most European goods to the U.S.
articles.content:
The European Union announced Monday that it will suspend for six months its planned countermeasures against the United States' tariffs, which which were set to take effect this week.
